label: 藤原篤茂
本: The Pursuit of Loneliness: Chinese and Japanese Nature Poetry in Medieval Japan, ca. 1050-1150 . Franz Steiner Verlag Stuttgart . 1995
説明文: (dates unknown, active second half tenth century). Composition in Honchō monzui (4) Kanshi in Wakan rōeishū 和漢朗詠集 (5), Shinsen rōeishū 新撰朗詠集 (3), and Sakumon daitai (1). [本朝文粋、漢詩、作文大体]
